COMMENT
Currently Sr. Territory Sales Engineer at Metito Overseas with full responsibility for operations and delivery of water treatment technologies and solutions for the industrial sector.
He is an experienced Chemical Engineer with excellent bilingual communication skills, market mapping, troubleshooting and penetration skills. He has a reputation for getting things done, on time and being initiative in proposing solutions for existing problems. Also he has the capability to manage people within the team and ensure the best performance and services.
His technical areas of expertise cover Industrial Water Treatment (Utilities), Wastewater Treatment, Water treatment Chemicals, Oil and Gas Chemicals (Downstream), Cement Industry and Health, Safety and Environment services.
